class.description: The internal class represented by this file.

attributes.description: Properties that describe how this entity works.

collidable.description: If enabled, the entity will collide with other collidable entities.

visible.description: If enabled, the entity will be visible when rendered.

interactable.description: If enabled, the entity will detect player interaction attempts.

triggerable.description: If enabled, the entity will detect player movement.

hitbox.description: How this entity's hitbox is placed.

x.description: The bottom edge of the hitbox relative to the entity's X position.

y.description: The left edge of the hitbox relative to the entity's Y position.

w.description: The horizontal size of the hitbox, extending to the right.

h.description: The vertical size of the hitbox, extending upwards.

position.description: Determines where to place the entity in the overworld.

x.description: Determines the bottom edge of the entity's current texture.

y.description: Determines the left edge of the entity's current texture.

animation.description: A path or URL linking to an animation file. If both an animation and a texture are specified, the animation will be used by the renderer.

texture.description: A path or URL linking to a texture file. If both an animation and a texture are specified, the animation will be used by the renderer.
